input.sentences: felicia wanted to go traveling before she settled down to find a relationship .
she was from oregon and got all the way to montana .
she ended up finding [male] before she even was halfway through her trip .
they bought a van together and decided to travel together .
she ended up seeing a lot of the world and she did it with him .
output.sentences: After a broken relationship decided to try traveling and get settled.
Halfway through the trip met a male.
The male had a van and we decided to travel together.
